name: Radiant Antelope
desc:
A beast that has undergone a unique evolution due to age-long immersion in the ancient moon's power.
Strange lightning once fell upon the land blessed by moonlight, causing once ordinary antelopes to gain the power to wield lightning. They say that some have seen a truly strange sight â€” antelopes standing on cliffs at the convergence of a storm, attracting bolts of lightning to temper their bodies.

dropMaterial.name: Mora
dropMaterial.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

dropMaterial.name: Lightless Bone
dropMaterial.desc:
A dull piece of bone taken from the exterior of a glowing beast.
It is a fragment from the exoskeleton of a monster infused with the ancient power of the moon. Along with the vanished light, it has also lost the secrets once hidden within.

dropMaterial.name: Glowing Remains
dropMaterial.desc:
A faintly glowing piece of bone taken from the exterior of a glowing beast.
It is the remains of an exoskeleton in which a vestige of the ancient power of the moon still lingers. It emanates a deep hue that still lingers long after being separated from its body, steeped as it is in the power of the moon.

dropMaterial.name: Radiant Exoskeleton
dropMaterial.desc:
A giant piece of bone that glows coldly, taken from the exterior of a glowing beast.
These beasts blessed by the ancient power of the moon are able to manipulate their exoskeletons through the light that has soaked into their marrow over long years. Even though their bones float apart from their bodies, they can still command them at will like any other physical part.

customize.text:
A monster that has undergone a unique evolution due to being drenched in the ancient moon's power for long periods of time. Radiant beasts can wield their innate powers to capture their enemies in a Radiant Cocoon... Once captured, both the amount of DMG taken and the strength of healing received will be affected.
However, you can escape from a Radiant Cocoon by <color=#ffe14b>being healed to your Max HP</color> , granting you the Disentangled effect which boosts your abilities for a short period of time. Use this opportunity to attack...
